review: 집근처 한강공원 깔끔해요 이사와서 제일 좋았던건 집앞에 한강이 있다는거.. 이번에 들어가는 입구도 공사해서 정말 깔끔해졌구요 다여섯시쯤 방문하면 노을이 반겨줍니다. 편의점에 앉아 먹는 뽀글이는 진리죠? 한산한 한강공원은 이곳! 다만 주차장은 복잡합니다 ㅜㅜ
review_en: Han River Park near my house is clean. The best thing about moving was that there was a Han River in front of my house. The entrance to the entrance has been constructed so it's very clean. If you visit at around 16, the sunset welcomes you. Isn't it the truth to eat curly sitting in a convenience store? The quiet Han River Park is here! But the parking lot is complicated. ㅜㅜ

review: 광나루 한강공원 서울에 있는 한강공원 중 거의 가장 동쪽 끝자락에 있는 공원입니다. 여유로운 분위기이구요 주말에는 주차가 조금 붐빌수도 있어요.
review_en: Gwangnaru Han River Park is near the eastern end of the Han River Park in Seoul. It's a relaxed atmosphere and parking may be a little crowded on weekends.
